类 CountdownPanel

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.app.CountdownPanel

public class CountdownPanel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
The class countdown panel that creates the countdown panel on the right of the main frame.

Nguyen Van 300528860

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
    Execute running field in domain when start button is pressed.
    javax.swing.JLabel buttonTitleSetup​(java.lang.String title)
    This method sets up JLabel for all the time, chips left, level labels on the panel with roboto fond, bold, size 20 and coloured in red
    javax.swing.JPanel getInventoryPanel()
    Return the panel that can hold an item.
    javax.swing.JLabel[] getItemPanel()
    Return the inventory item panel.
    javax.swing.JLayeredPane getPanel()
    This method returns to countdown panel.
    int getRemainingTreasures()
    This method return the remaining treasures.
    boolean getStarted()
    Return if the game is started or paused.
    int getTimer()
    This method return the remaining time in game.
    void pause()
    This method is called when the game is paused which timer will stop counting and also change the button label in menu bar.
    void setStarted​(boolean startedOrPaused)
    Set the started field true or false.
    void setUpInventoryPanel()
    This method sets up the inventory panel.
    void start()
    This method is called when the game starts or to resume the game and also change the button label in menu bar.
    void stop()
    This method is called when the game is lost which will stop the timer and reset the level.
    javax.swing.JLabel titleLabel​(java.lang.String title, java.awt.Color col)
    This method sets up JLabel for all the time, chips left, level labels on the panel with roboto fond, bold, size 20 and coloured in red
    void updateRemainingChip​(int remaining_chips)
    This method is to update the remaining chips on the right hand panel
    void updateTime​(int seconds_remaining)
    Setter method for both the seconds remaining and the label to display them.

    • CountdownPanel

      public CountdownPanel​(int time, int current_level, int chipsleft, App app)
      Constructor for the coundown panel.
      参数:
      time - duration given in the level
      current_level - level player is playing
      chipsleft - number of chips on board in the level
      app - the app class

      public javax.swing.JLabel buttonTitleSetup​(java.lang.String title)

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      Execute running field in domain when start button is pressed. Start button will disapear.
      指定者:
      actionPerformed 在接口中 java.awt.event.ActionListener
      参数:
      e - event

    • start

      public void start()
      This method is called when the game starts or to resume the game and also change the button label in menu bar.

    • pause

      public void pause()
      This method is called when the game is paused which timer will stop counting and also change the button label in menu bar.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      This method is called when the game is lost which will stop the timer and reset the level.
